content: readme.md scrapesave one you realise your beautiful beautiful code codechef problems is sitting a server. put much efforts, those hours spent chosing right algorithm the data structure to the green tick. who knows your efforts ? decide i showcase my beautiful beautiful code world. this is tool you!! if want study brilliant coder's code one simple place again is tool you!! requirements :beautifulsouprequestsinstructions :# clone repositorygit clone https://github.com/aviral1701/scrapesavegit# into repositorycd scrapesave# run apppython codechef_scrapper.py#enter username prompted.todos : the code run faster.save files language extension in code comments write url the problem.contributing :fork repo.create new branch named <your_feature>commit changes make pr.prs are welcome.
